puzzle.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a game or toy that has a lot of pieces that you have to fit together
puzzle.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a game in which you have to think hard to solve a difficult question or problem
puzzle.translation[0].definitions[2].def: something that is difficult to understand or explain
puzzle.translation[0].definitions[2].exa: The meaning of the poem has always been a puzzle.
He thought he had solved the puzzle.
the puzzle of how the sun works
puzzle.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to confuse someone or make them feel slightly anxious because they do not understand something
puzzle.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: a question that continues to puzzle scientists
He was puzzled by the reactions to his remark.
What puzzles me is why his books are so popular.
